item.description:
All,

Sorry for the late notice. We will play, yet again, this Saturday @ 2pm on Cambridge Common. We are looking to have a fun, co-ed flag-football playing time. All skill levels are welcome and encouraged to participate. We have a great group of regulars and are always excited to meet new people. It looks like it will be cold Saturday, so dress warm.

We hope to see you Saturday!

-Flag Footballers of Cambridge
item.name: Flag Football - SAT 2PM - Cambridge Common
